name: Proto Wormhole Research Division
description:
It's a little janky, so bare with me.

An assignment where we were each tasked with rebuilding a prototype based on Portal, and adding to it to develop our own level and mechanics.

Controls
WASD + Mouse >> Move and look
Left Shift >> Sprint
Spacebar >> Jump
Left-click or Left Ctrl >> Blue portal
Right-click or Left Alt >> Orange Portal

Fundamental code & assets (Portals, character & camera controller) were provided by our Scripting instructor, Pascal Lambert.
All other code & assets (the level design, the HUD/UI, the moving platform, the damage and health system including the lasers and health capsule, the objectives, the game over flow, and anything else I forgot to mention) are done by me.

Also, no audio because I couldn't be bothered. This assignment kicked my ass. Literally everything that could have gone wrong happened.
